1. Information We Collect

 1.1 Personal Information<

 When you create an account, we collect information such as your name, email address, and password. If you choose to subscribe to premium features, we collect payment information, which is processed securely by our payment processors.

 1.2 Usage Information

 We collect information about your use of the app, including the languages you are learning, the courses you take, your progress, and your interactions with the app. We collect information on how you use the translation features, including the text you input for translation.

 1.3 Device Information

 We collect information about the device you use to access the app, including the device model, operating system, unique device identifiers, and network information.

 1.4 Location Information

 With your consent, we may collect information about your precise location to provide location-based services and improve the app's functionality.

 2. How We Use Your Information

 2.1 To Provide and Improve Our Services

 To personalize your learning experience and provide customized content. To process your transactions and manage your subscriptions. To improve the app's functionality, user experience, and content offerings.

 2.2 To Communicate with You

 To send you updates, notifications, and administrative messages. To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support.

 2.3 For Analytics and Research

 To analyze usage patterns and improve our services. To conduct research and develop new features.

 2.4 For Marketing and Promotions

 To send you promotional materials and offers, with your consent.

 3. Sharing Your Information

 3.1 Service Providers

 We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, and customer support.

 3.2 Legal Compliance

 We may disclose your information if required to do so by law or in response to valid requests by public authorities.

 3.3 Business Transfers

 In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of all or a portion of our assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

 4. Your Rights and Choices

 4.1 Access and Update Your Information

 You can access and update your personal information through your account settings.

 4.2 Opt-Out of Marketing Communications

 You can opt-out of receiving promotional emails by following the unsubscribe instructions in those emails.

 4.3 Delete Your Account

 You can request the deletion of your account by contacting us at [Contact Email]. Please note that some information may remain in our records after your account has been deleted.

 5. Security

 We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.

 6. Children's Privacy

 Our app is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected such information, we will take steps to delete it.

 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy

 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
